com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.server

Interface ProxySettings

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProxySettingsImpl

    public interface ProxySettings
    The ProxySettings are used to set up a ServerConnection via a proxy server. The getConnectionType() defines if the connection is established direct, via system proxy or via defined custom proxy server. On most operating system a fallback to direct connection will be performed if the connection via proxy server fails.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ProxySettings DIRECT
      No proxy will be used.
      static ProxySettings SYSTEM_PROXY
      The system proxy will be used.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionType getConnectionType()
      Gets the type.
      String getProxyServerAddress()
      Gets the proxy server address.
      int getProxyServerPort()
      Gets the proxy server port.
      User getProxyUser()
      Gets the proxy user and password.
      boolean isProxyUseAuthentification()
      If isProxyUseAuthentification() is true getProxyUser() will be used for authentication.

    • Field Detail

      • SYSTEM_PROXY

        static final ProxySettings SYSTEM_PROXY
        The system proxy will be used.

      • DIRECT

        static final ProxySettings DIRECT
        No proxy will be used.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnectionType

        ConnectionType getConnectionType()
        Gets the type.

      • getProxyServerAddress

        String getProxyServerAddress()
        Gets the proxy server address.

      • getProxyServerPort

        int getProxyServerPort()
        Gets the proxy server port.

      • getProxyUser

        User getProxyUser()
        Gets the proxy user and password. Only used if isProxyUseAuthentification() is true.

      • isProxyUseAuthentification

        boolean isProxyUseAuthentification()
        If isProxyUseAuthentification() is true getProxyUser() will be used for authentication.
        Returns:
        true, if isProxyAuthentification is used
